text:
@JoeBiden @JoeKing3333 Everyone in this adm must be punished to the fullest extent of the law.
Justice died when GOP took oversight, SCOTUS. 
Now Trump vetoes it has the christian Taliban in charge of DOJ. 
DeVos is organizing those covid19 spreading Trump rallies. Her brother is a traitor to the US.
